ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Dagger or Staff?
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I had Banshee Aura running and I wasn t attacking (never turned on attack) but my Offense went up from the damage shield going OFF!!!!!  I never
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I had Banshee Aura running and I wasn't attacking (never turned on attack) but my Offense went up from the damage shield going OFF!!!!!  I never knew that!   Did any of you know that Banshee Aura can raise your offense w/o even attacking?  Hehe cool!
 
Also as a Gnome Necro, how important is my faction w/ Merchants of Akkanon?   There is the little gnome that was yellow and Dubious to me just outside the necro guild so I killed him at 24th lvl!!  Yeah I love soloing Yellows.  LOL  anyway (that was where my Banshee Aura made my Offense go up) it DID HELP my faction w/ Dark Reflection.  
 
Main question is "Is the BANKER considered a Merchant?"  I think I know the answer already.  I just hate most Gnomes for Hating us Necros and being Dubious by Defauly in my own city.  GRRRRRR But hey the necros Guild Loves me!
 :-)
 
Skel Lifebane  of the 24th circle of death.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Naeeldar
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 3:29 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Dagger or Staff?

From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>

Heh cast lifetap dot go up to some mobs in lower guk anywhere works and take
a beating. My defense has been maxed for quite awhile now.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Jerry Luttrell <tinarin@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 2:07 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Dagger or Staff?


>From: "Jerry Luttrell" <tinarin@...>
>
>Actually I still melee at 50 on rare occasions to get my defense up, but
>nonly for very short periods of time against easy, for my lvl, mobs, But
>yeah any serious melee is done by 20 or 25.
>
>>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Dagger or Staff?
>>Date: Tue, 14 Mar 2000 23:05:20 -0500
>>
>>Whatever skill the best weapon you can lay your hand on at your level is
>>what you should go with. Truth is by level 20 or so you'll probably stop
>>meleeing and by 25 your probably done with it forever for the most part.
>>
>>Naeeldar K'Valle Level 50 Dark Elf Necromancer
>>
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: Marlon Clark <marlonclark@...>

>> >
